content: r57 in the central panel chain 15 j in the chain-20 space of r49g work 5 single_crochet separated by chain 3 k chain 15 1 slip_stitch in the 3rd fphdc blo of r57 l repeat steps e and f 9 more times m on the last repetition the treble_crochet of step e is made in the chain-3 corner space n 1 treble_crochet in the same corner chain-3 space chain 1 * o repeat from ** 3 more times once per side p join with 1 slip_stitch to the 2nd treble_crochet of the round totals 72 pairs x 2 treble_crochet + ch1 18 per side 8 treble_crochet 2 per corner 20 single_crochet 5 per side 8 chain-15 space 2 per side 4 chain-1 space 1 per corner 8 slip_stitch 2 per side continue images 12 61 - camel a see video for visual reference b start in the chain-1 space of any corner 2 treble_crochet c 1 fptr in the second treble_crochet of the previous round chain 1 1 fptr in the first treble_crochet of the side previous round crossed pair d skip next treble_crochet and repeat the sequence e work 9 pairs of 2 treble_crochet + chain 1 f 1 slip_stitch in the 3rd fphdc blo of r57 in the central panel g in the chain-15 space work 3 pairs of 2 treble_crochet + chain 1 h 3 pairs in the single_crochet of the r 60j i 3 pairs in the next chain 15-space 1 slip_stitch in the 3rd fphdc blo of r57 of the central panel j work 10 of 2 treble_crochet + chain 1 in the first pair the second treble_crochet is made into the chain-15 space k 2 treble_crochet in the corner chain 1 l repeat from * to * 3 more times once per side m join with 1 slip_stitch to the second treble_crochet of the round totals 116 pairs each pair = 2 treble_crochet + chain 1 29 per side 16 treble_crochet 4 per corner 8 slip_stitch 2 per side 4 chain-1 space 1 per corner images 13 14 62 - camel a see video for visual reference b start in the chain-2 space of any corner 2 treble_crochet c 1 fptr in the third treble_crochet of the previous round chain 1 1 fptr in the second treble_crochet of the previous round crossed pair d skip next treble_crochet and repeat the sequence e work 10 pairs of 2 treble_crochet + chain 1 then 1 slip_stitch in the 3rd st of the central panel f work 8 pairs of 2 treble_crochet + chain 1 then 1 slip_stitch in the 3rd st of the central panel g work 11 pairs of 2 treble_crochet + chain 1 h 2 treble_crochet in the corner chain 1 i repeat from * to * 3 more times once per side j join with 1 slip_stitch to the second treble_crochet of the round totals 120 pairs each pair = 2 treble_crochet + chain 1 30 per side 16 treble_crochet 4 per corner
